Detailed Description

Encapsulates a callback function to be executed when a new quota is made available.

We primarily want this to allow us to call back the sleeping WebCore thread from outside the WebViewCore class (as the native call is private). It is imperative that this the setDatabaseQuota method is executed once a decision to either allow or deny new quota is made, otherwise the WebCore thread will remain asleep.
